00042 #ifndef _orxPLUGIN_COREDEFINE_H_
00043 #define _orxPLUGIN_COREDEFINE_H_
00044 
00045 /*
00046  * Macros for core plugin register function declaration
00047  */
00048 #define orxPLUGIN_CORE_REGISTER_FUNCTION_NAME(PLUGIN_SUFFIX) _registerFunction_##PLUGIN_SUFFIX
00049 
00050 #define orxPLUGIN_DECLARE_CORE_REGISTER_FUNCTION(PLUGIN_SUFFIX) extern orxDLLAPI void orxPLUGIN_CORE_REGISTER_FUNCTION_NAME(PLUGIN_SUFFIX)()
00051 
00052 
00053 /*
00054  * Includes all core plugin headers
00055  */
00056 #include "plugin/define/orxPlugin_Display.h"
00057 #include "plugin/define/orxPlugin_Joystick.h"
00058 #include "plugin/define/orxPlugin_Keyboard.h"
00059 #include "plugin/define/orxPlugin_Mouse.h"
00060 #include "plugin/define/orxPlugin_Physics.h"
00061 #include "plugin/define/orxPlugin_Render.h"
00062 #include "plugin/define/orxPlugin_SoundSystem.h"
00063 
00064 
00065 /*
00066  * Defines all core plugin register function
00067  */
00068 orxPLUGIN_DECLARE_CORE_REGISTER_FUNCTION(DISPLAY);
00069 orxPLUGIN_DECLARE_CORE_REGISTER_FUNCTION(JOYSTICK);
00070 orxPLUGIN_DECLARE_CORE_REGISTER_FUNCTION(KEYBOARD);
00071 orxPLUGIN_DECLARE_CORE_REGISTER_FUNCTION(MOUSE);
00072 orxPLUGIN_DECLARE_CORE_REGISTER_FUNCTION(PHYSICS);
00073 orxPLUGIN_DECLARE_CORE_REGISTER_FUNCTION(RENDER);
00074 orxPLUGIN_DECLARE_CORE_REGISTER_FUNCTION(SOUNDSYSTEM);
00075 
00076 /*
00077  * Inline core plugin registration function
00078  */
00079 static orxINLINE void orxPlugin_RegisterCorePlugins()
00080 {
00081   orxPLUGIN_CORE_REGISTER_FUNCTION_NAME(DISPLAY)();
00082   orxPLUGIN_CORE_REGISTER_FUNCTION_NAME(JOYSTICK)();
00083   orxPLUGIN_CORE_REGISTER_FUNCTION_NAME(KEYBOARD)();
00084   orxPLUGIN_CORE_REGISTER_FUNCTION_NAME(MOUSE)();
00085   orxPLUGIN_CORE_REGISTER_FUNCTION_NAME(PHYSICS)();
00086   orxPLUGIN_CORE_REGISTER_FUNCTION_NAME(RENDER)();
00087   orxPLUGIN_CORE_REGISTER_FUNCTION_NAME(SOUNDSYSTEM)();
00088 }
00089 
00090 #endif /*_orxPLUGIN_COREDEFINE_H_*/
